attributes.additional_details:
Parents face fine and  prosecution.Holiday providers receiving the full benefits,rather 
than parents ,cashing this law. Families are forced to deprivation and pushed towards lower self esteem,stressful life and depression.Which can cause families to fall apart.. A special discount of upto 50% off ,should be granted on Air fares and holiday packages.Alternatively,air fares should be provided as otherwise.
attributes.background: double cost of air fares , prevents parents from travelling ,with their young children, even once a year.Going to Europe can easily cost around £4000 if you travel during Holidays.Special discount should  be provided to families ,so that they can travel without falling into big debt.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to offer cheaper air fares and holiday packages for families would be one for holiday companies. 

You could raise this issue with holiday companies directly. 

If you want Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for holiday companies to increase their prices during school holidays, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/225478
